A healthy Anthony Parker scored 25 points, Allen Iverson had 24 points and 13 assists, and the Denver Nuggets beat the Charlotte Bobcats 117-101 on Saturday night. It didn't hurt at all, said Anthony Parker , who missed five games after landing on the foot of Kobe Bryant on Jan. 21. "It felt good to be back."
